Name: Ascender's Bane
Description: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck. Ethereal.
Notes: (Obtained from Ascension level 10 and higher at the start of the game.)

Name: Curse of the Bell
Description: Unplayable. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Name: Decay
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Name: Doubt
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.

Name: Necronomicurse
Description: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse. (Cannot be Removed from your deck. When Exhausted, a new copy appears in your hand.)
Notes: (Obtained when Necronomicon is acquired. Removed if Necronomicon is disacquired.)

Name: Normality
Description: Unplayable. You cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.

Name: Pain
Description: Unplayable. While in hand, lose 1 HP when other cards are played.

Name: Parasite
Description: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

Name: Pride
Description: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Notes: (Obtained from the Grotesque Trophy Blight in Endless Mode.)

Name: Regret
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Name: Shame
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.
